definition: small token/mere trifle (used of one's gifts)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: This is just a little something, please accept it.
sentences.chinese: 這是一點小意思，請笑納。

sentences.english: This is a small something for you. I hope you like it.
sentences.chinese: 這是我給你的一點小意思，希望你喜歡它。

sentences.english: It's just a little expression of gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 這是一點小意思以表感謝。

sentences.english: A: Just a little something, nothing else.
sentences.chinese: 就是一點小意思而已，沒其他意思。

sentences.english: I used to drive ship in my hometown. Trust me!
sentences.chinese: 小意思，你別小看我，我在老家就常開船。

sentences.english: Please do accept my little favor.
sentences.chinese: 這點小意思，請務必收下。

sentences.english: It's just a little something to show my appreciation .
sentences.chinese: 這只是一點小意思，聊表謝意。

sentences.english: A: This is just a little something, please accept it.
sentences.chinese: 這是一點小意思，請笑納。

sentences.english: This trouble is nothing to me. I'll settle it in a while.
sentences.chinese: 這點兒故障，小意思，一會兒就修好。

sentences.english: Andwe always have those little hearts.
sentences.chinese: 我們總會表達一點兒小意思。

sentences.english: Here is a little, something from my company, please take it.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們公司的一點小意思，請笑納。

sentences.english: Thank you, these are the points, a mere trifle, but slightly.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝，這些不過都是點小意思咯。

sentences.english: This i$-small something for you. I hope you like it.
sentences.chinese: 這是我給你的一點小意思，希望你喜歡它。

sentences.english: Now, you may say, "Well, big deal.

definition: a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy
to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
lit. one hair from nine oxen (idiom)/fig. a drop in the ocean
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
not to pose a problem for sb/cannot stump sb
at worst/if worst comes to worst/serious/alarming
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); very easy
